sect2.title: Authors: Deitel/Deitel (Additional comments by Olson and Zander)
sect2.para: Array class: like an int array (retains all functionality) but also includes additional features: allows input and output of the whole array allows for comparison of 2 arrays, element by element allows for assignment of 2 arrays size is part of the class (so no longer needs to be passed) includes range checking, program terminates for out-of-bound subscripts
Implementation and assumptions: size defaults to a fixed size of 10 if size is not specified array elements are initialized to zero user must enter valid integers when using >>
